column1: Biomedical & Molecular Sciences Research MSc, MRes
column5: The Biomedical & Molecular Sciences Research MSc, MRes course is a multi- disciplinary programme that will provide you with superior practical skills and a firm theoretical grounding in a range of scientific fields.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: MSc: one year FT; MRes 16 months FT
